actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery in the State of South Carolina.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to establish a national cemetery in the State of South Carolina, at or near the city of Columbia if desirable and practical. Authorized the transfer of surplus federally owned lands for a site for such cemetery, or in the alternative the acquisition of such lands as the Administrator judges to be suitable.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of a national cemetery in the State of South Carolina.
